'''Richard Whiteside''' (born April 15, 1968) was a New Zealand actor who played as an [[Lonely Mountain|Erebor]] Dwarf guard, [[Barliman Butterbur#Portrayal in adaptations|Butterbur, Sr.]], a [[Lake-town]] guard, and a Lake-town refugee in ''[[The Hobbit (film series)|The Hobbit]]'' trilogy.<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://www.nzonscreen.com/profile/richard-whiteside|articlename=Richard Whiteside NZ On Screen Profile|website=[https://www.nzonscreen.com/ NZ on Screen]|accessed=15-Feb-2022}}</ref>
